sentences.en: A trainload more may soon be on the way.
sentences.cn: 承载更多运输量的列车即将出现。

sentences.en: Recently, with the improvement of train speed and trainload, traffic safety on railway becomes more and more important. Accordingly, the demand of Non-Destructive Testing (NDT) is growing higher.
sentences.cn: 近年来，随着列车速度的不断提升和列车运载重量的不断增加，铁路的运营安全越来越重要，相应地对无损检测（NDT）的要求也越来越高。

sentences.en: The trainload means the quantity that can be carried by a train
sentences.cn: 装载量是指列车所能装载的数量。

trans.tran_cn: 列车载重，列车载客[载货]量
